experience: You and Katarina both know Xavier Musy, Roger Hurni, and 13 others
Katarina started at Swiftpage 7 months after you did

Do you know a talented Web Developer with a creative eye?  We'd love to add them to the Marketing organization at Swiftpage.  Collaborative, energetic, design-oriented web guru AND master coder?  We are looking for them!  This is a full time employee position in our Scottsdale office.
6 Tips for Effective Holiday Email Marketing

Vice President, Strategic Marketing and Design

Led a facilities management and software marketing organization regarding all aspects of brand, messaging, digital, in-house creative development, software, UX/UI and instructional design.  Responsible for managing demand generation through brand and content development, B2B proposal preparation, trade shows, collateral, as well as all aspects of digital marketing.

Oversaw strategy, operations and execution of Trade, Field, Multicultural, Niche and Retail Channel marketing and creative.  Directed 4 creative and media agencies, managed $10M ad budget, $1M production budget and led all local and bi-lingual media buys.  Primary liaison to 4 Regional Executive Presidents for local execution.  Managed channel communications for retail, indirect retail, door to door, referral program and multi-dwelling units.  Led strategic and creative execution for Hispanic, Military, College, Movers & Snowbird segments.
Senior Director, Mass Communications and Multicultural Marketing

Spearheaded and launched Qwest’s new brand campaign for Heavy Duty Internet service in English and Spanish. Drove acquisition and retention for High Speed Internet, Verizon Wireless, DirecTV and Voice for both General and Multicultural markets. Directed 5 creative and media agencies, managed $80 million media budget and reported directly to CMO. Oversaw the creative design, strategy and production of all television, radio, OOH, print, and online in English and Spanish. Award winning creative recognized by Wall Street Journal (see link below), Cannes Film festival, AdAge, AdWeek, Brand Week, Best Ads in America.

Recruited by EVP to pilot role; it became model for organization. Led campaign management from offer negotiation with product management, campaign strategy, agency briefing, creative development to training front line sales. Launched first Qwest “themed” campaign in 2006 with double digit increases to product awareness. Managed AOR and media agency and reported directly to EVP.

Marketing and Design at SBM Management Services, LP
August 8, 2017, Leslie reported directly to Katarina

I am grateful for the opportunity to have worked for Katarina.  In her capacity as VP of Strategic Marketing and Design, she provided clear direction with a vision that was always a step ahead. She actively listened and sought out insights from our team members and other key contacts throughout departments within our organization. She led our department with professionalism, clarity, creativity and positive motivation. She was extremely well-respected by all stakeholders, internal and external to our team. Her experience mixed with her professional demeanor, clear goals and communication style make her a memorable and valued leader. I would welcome the opportunity work for Katarina again.

Award-winning Strategic Multicultural brand builder.  Pragmatic Marketing and Social Media Certified.
January 26, 2016, Jessie worked with Katarina in different groups

Few people have the opportunity to work with a talented marketing executive who is also a coach and a mentor – but I did when I worked with Katarina. I had the pleasure of working with Katarina for over 10 years at Qwest, collaborating on several project teams and then more closely at CenturyLink as key stakeholders and drivers of the marketing engine targeting the multicultural Hispanic consumers. I was always in awe of Katarina’s ability to command a room and get people on board with ideas—even people who were initially on completely different pages. Oh, and she made sure to celebrate our birthdays, personal and career milestones. Talk about motivating a team! I miss working with her every day. As a leader who understands what it takes to drive growth and how to deliver impactful and cost effective marketing plans and communication strategies, Katarina earns my highest recommendation.

January 19, 2016, Nina reported directly to Katarina

Anyone that reports to Katarina is lucky.  She was a great manager when I reported to her at CenturyLink.  Her strategic knowledge, her experience in leading multifunctional teams and her passion for delivering results, makes her an ideal candidate for a leadership role.  She has the unique ability to breakdown complex issues and engage teams to find solutions.  These skills were critical to our department's success. Katarina's style of management is fair and inspiring; she was always willing to coach in a genuinely caring manner.  Her inclusive demeanor and the depth of her leadership experience would make her an asset to any organization.

I had the pleasure of working with and reporting to Katarina for 5 years during my tenure at CenturyLink. Katarina is one of those rare leaders who leads with dedication, passion and kindness. She was always willing to teach, was always open to feedback and dialogue and never hesitated to give credit where and to whom credit was due - she did so privately and publicly. Katarina is the perfect combination of leadership, intrinsic motivation and kindness. I left CenturyLink a better manager and a better person because of her and for that, I will always be grateful.

December 21, 2015, Geoff reported directly to Katarina

Insightful, supportive and fair are words that come to mind when I think about Katarina Stanisic. I’ve had the pleasure of working for Katarina in different roles over the past 10 years, during which time she supervised my work on a number of long-term contract projects in the Consumer advertising department at CenturyLink (formerly Qwest). Above all, I was impressed with Katarina's ability to manage disparate teams with a range of responsibilities while being fully present with each. Katarina was an important supervisory resource for me in terms of guidance, direction, and professional support. She would be a true asset for any position requiring combined creative and executive skills. As a leader, Katarina earns my high recommendation.

March 18, 2017, Katarina was senior to Rashael but didn’t manage directly

Rashael is not only a talented UX/UI designer, but a thoughtful leader and mentor to the teams she manages.  She is able to quickly assess skill sets, identify gaps and set priorities, but most importantly, she has a knack for devising the right process and protocol upfront for optimal design work later.  She builds confidence in her direct reports and motivates them to be the best they can be.  She is an expert in her field and has a beautiful eye for creative as well as a critical one for function and user experience.  Rashael would be a valuable asset to any organization lucky enough to have her.

summary: CREATING MARKET LEADERSHIP THROUGH INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONSI am a Strategic Marketing Executive with demonstrated ability to drive growth while building brand preference for multi-billion dollar Fortune 500 companies. My expertise lies in leading high performing marketing teams - from strategy, research, media and creative, to advertising production, agency management and campaign ROI analysis.  Multi-dimensional capabilities:       Brand Transitions: Transformed brand awareness and brand preference by over 20% with Qwest’s new Heavy Duty Internet campaign.P&L Accountability: Managed $6.5B P&L leading three director teams, 56 employees and a $75M advertising budget.ROI:  Led Qwest’s most successful consumer campaign ever launched – broke all previous sales records, attained the lowest cost-per-call and cost-per-sale by media while stealing share from Cox, Comcast, AT&T & Verizon.Agency Management/Operational Efficiency:  Oversaw all media and creative agency reviews.  Managed the shift from a large external ad agency to smaller boutique agencies. Lowered production and agency fees 22% year-over-year while improving the quality of communications.Integrated Marketing Communications: Led hundreds of marketing campaigns using a mix of DRTV, direct mail, shared mail, radio, print, PR, social media, email, display, search, retail, and event marketing with significant impacts to CPGA, ARPU, penetration, call volume and retention. Exceptional skills in: - Marketing & Communications Strategy- Leadership and development of large high performing teams	- Creative and media agency management- Media strategy, planning and production- Multicultural Marketing by Acculturation	- Digital display, Search, Email, Content	- Product Launches and Positioning- Brand Development          Internationally award winning creative recognized by:- Cannes Film Festival- Wall Street Journal- Advertising Age- AdWeek- Brand Week- Best Ads in America
name: Katarina Stanisic, MBA
title: CMO | Strategic Brand Builder | Digital | Software | CPG | UX/UI
